name: Bebbo

ingredients.name: honey syrup (equal parts honey and water)

preparation:
Put summer’s blood oranges to good use in this light citrusy gin drink from Ted Haigh’s 2004 book “Vintage Spirits and Forgotten Cocktails.”

Pour ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake for 30 seconds.

Fine-strain into a chilled coupe.

Garnish with a lemon twist.
